Assessment.QuestionText: You want to apply the font as <font face="courier new">Verdana</font>, size as <font face="courier new">12</font>, and style as <font face="courier new">Underline</font> to the text "Sample Text". Which one of the following codes will help you to achieve this?

Options.Option:
Label lblText = new Label();
lblText(Text) = "Sample Text";
lblText(AutoSize) = true;
Font font = "Verdana", 12, FontStyle.Underline;
lblText.Font = font;
Controls.Add(lblText);

Label lblText = new Label();
lblText.Text = "Sample Text";
lblText.AutoSize = true;
Font font = new Font("Verdana", 12, FontStyle.Underline);
lblText.Font = font;
Controls.Add(lblText);

Label lblText = new Label();
lblText(Text) = "Sample Text";
lblText(AutoSize) = true;
Font font = new Font("Verdana", 12, FontStyle.Underline);
lblText.Font = font;
Controls.Add = lblText;

Label lblText = new Label();
lblText.Text = "Sample Text";
lblText.AutoSize = true;
Font font = "Verdana", 12, FontStyle.Underline;
lblText.Font = font;
Controls.Add = lblText;

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct answer is: (B).
